Package edu.pdx.cs410J.whitlock

Class AirlineXmlHelper

java.lang.Object
edu.pdx.cs410J.ProjectXmlHelper
edu.pdx.cs410J.whitlock.AirlineXmlHelper
All Implemented Interfaces:
EntityResolver, ErrorHandler
public class AirlineXmlHelper extends ProjectXmlHelper
This class provides easy access to the SYSTEM and PUBLIC ids for the Airline XML DTD and implements some convenient error handling methods.
